SAP Fiori is the modern user experience (UX) design system for SAP software, created to transform complex business processes into simple, intuitive digital experiences. Unlike the traditional, menu-heavy SAP interfaces of the past, Fiori focuses on a role-based approach, ensuring that users only see the specific applications and data necessary for their job functions. It is built on a responsive framework, meaning the interface adapts seamlessly across desktops, tablets, and smartphones, allowing for a consistent workflow regardless of the device.
At its core, Fiori aims to improve productivity by following five key design principles: it is role-based, adaptive, simple, coherent, and delightful.
